title: The Obamas that are facing financially and Sasha's biological father?
subtitle: Reports that a man named Ezekiel Wilkinmeyer Williams filed a lawsuit claiming to be Malia's biological father and Sasha Obama are false news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Ezekiel Wilkinmeyer Williams, Malia's biological father, and Sasha Obama, filed a lawsuit against Barack and Michelle Obama.
